pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CAD to shapelyconvert a CAD file to [shapely](https://pypi.org/project/Shapely/) geometry for downstream processing.Currently supports, to varying degrees:- DXF using [exdxf](https://pypi.org/project/ezdxf/)- (IGES to follow)- (SVG to follow)## UtilsAlso some utils in utils.py## ExampleTo run example in `example.py` you need to install matplotlib `pip install matplotlib`.
